title: What should Twitter's CEO do (May 2015)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Allow linked accounts, would greatly simplify life for those with multiple accounts that make use of the website over many of the countless apps available. Adapt DM'ing to a more IM-like feature. Make better use of space on the desktop website. Introduce a Twitter Lite mobile app that minimizes data use, especially for emerging markets. Look into the reason random, unwanted unfollows happen, I regularly notice that I suddenly don't follow people I used to. Bring back proper Instagram integration. Add a feature that allows you to just view image posts on your timeline. Add some better analytics and search tools with more data. That's all just some things off the top of my head...

Grrrrr. I would apologize to my shareholders, I would cut costs, I would accept an emergency meeting of the Board to fire my sorry self, I would monetize Periscope and I would consider replacing at least some of the sorry Board with people better suited to growing this incredible resource.
